Once the purifier is on, Push the Wi-Fi button on the device for 3 seconds. After hearing a \"Ding\" from the device, the Wi-Fi indicator starts flashing, showing the device is now in configuration mode. Then, input the name and password of the network and click \"Start Configuration\".
Please unplug the device and plug it again.
Scan the QR code located behind your purifier
Please check if the Wi-Fi is active on your phone and if you are connected to the same Wi-Fi as your product.
Share pairing by QR code or login
This QR code is valid for 5 minutes
Please correctly enter the e-mail address. This user must have already installed the application and have created an account.
We advise you to turn your air purifier on
The air is pure, ideal for outdoor activities!
The air is moderately polluted. Greater than the maximum limit established for one year by WHO. A long-term exposure may be risky for your health
Impact on health in case of chronic exposure
The air has reached a high level of pollution. Higher than the maximum limit for 24 hours established by WHO.
The air has reached a very high level of pollution. Effects can be immediately felt by sensitive individuals. Everybody feels the effects of a prolonged exposure.
The pollution level has reached a critical level. Sensitive people feel immediate effects. Even healthy people may show symptoms for short exposure.
Pollution has reached extreme levels. Immediate effects on health.
Airpocalypse! Immediate and heavy effects on everybody.

During the use of the application, cookies may be placed on your device. These cookies are used to store information and some are necessary to access certain contents and / or services of the application. Select your choice for each category of cookie then click on «Validate and continue». You can adjust your choices at any time from the page «Use of cookies» in the «Settings» section of the application.
We use audience measurement solutions to analyze traffic, trends and usages and identify malfunctions on the application to improve your user experience.
The current version is %1$s, and you can update to version %2$s.
A new version is available, please update your current version
The air outside is pure,\nOpen your windows
The outside air is highly polluted. If possible, avoid main roads : Going away from a few tens of meters can make a big difference !
The outside pollution is very high. Avoid intensive sport activities outside.\nAvoid main roads: Going away from a few tens of meters can make a big difference !
Toxic air outside :( Stay inside as much as possible\nIn case of respiratory and cardiac discomfort, consult your doctor

1. Turn ON the product, then press the blue Wi-Fi button for 3 seconds.
2. The product emits a “ding” and the Wi-Fi indicator flashes to indicate that the device is in configuration mode.

Pure Air uses notifications to send you alerts of indoor and outdoor pollution peaks, and to give you relevant advices to breathe pure air at any time.

is poor. We advise you to limit oudoor activities and turn on your air purifier
We advise you to limit outdoor activities.
PM2.5 refers to particles with diameter smaller than 2.5 microns that can easily penetrate the membrane of lung cells.

O₃ is a form of oxygen that has three atoms per molecule rather than the usual two. When it is in the upper atmosphere it absorbs ultraviolet rays, hereby being a lifesaver. However, near the earth\'s surface it is a harmful pollutant which contributes to respiratory diseases such as asthma.

NO₂ (Nitrogen Dioxide) is part of a group of highly reactive gases and primarily gets in the air from the burning of fuel. Breathing air with a high concentration of NO₂ can irritate airways in the human respiratory system.
PM10 refers to particles with diameter smaller than 10 microns.

Make sure that your phone is connected to your home Wi-Fi network.
You are not connected to your home Wi-Fi network yet. Please connect your smartphone to the Wi-Fi.\n
Hold the Wi-Fi button during 3 seconds, you will hear a double ding and the Wi-Fi button flashes to indicate that the Wi-Fi is ON.

1) Go to your Wi-Fi settings and wait for the network called AIR PURIFIER XXXX to appear\n 2) Connect to the network according to info on the sticker of rear housing \n 3) Come back on the application Pure Air.

The pairing with the product is made using your local WiFi network. The product will use the WiFi from your phone to connect with your Internet box.

During the use of the application, cookies may be placed on your mobile. These cookies serve to store information and some are nessary to access certaion contents and / or services of the application. Select your choice. You can adjust your choice at any time from the page 《Use of cookies》in the 《Settings》section of the application.
By clicking <OK>, you agree to use of audience measurement cookies to enhance your user experience.
